sql.query:
SELECT *
FROM charges_family AS charges_family
WHERE family = :P1 /* {{$_GET.familyid}} */
ORDER BY chargeFor_monthly DESC, chargeFor_session DESC

SELECT SUM(tp.amount) as paid, (SELECT SUM(pw.enrolGrandTotal) FROM charges_enrolments pw WHERE pw.chargeId = :P1) as enrolTotals
FROM payments_enrolcharges tp JOIN charges_enrolments pw ON tp.enrolchargeid = pw.id WHERE pw.chargeId = :P1;

SELECT CONVERT_TZ(NOW(), '+00:00','Australia/Sydney') > c.dueDate as overdue
FROM charges_family c
WHERE c.id = :P1
LIMIT 1;

SELECT DISTINCT tpayments.*, pt.pay_type
FROM (
    SELECT tp.*
    FROM payments_familycharges tp
        LEFT JOIN payments_enrolcharges tlp ON tp.id = tlp.paymentid
        LEFT JOIN charges_enrolments pw ON tlp.enrolchargeid = pw.id
        WHERE pw.chargeId = :P1
    ) tpayments LEFT JOIN paymentTypes pt ON tpayments.paymentType = pt.id
ORDER BY tpayments.paymentdate DESC

SELECT payments_enrolcharges.paymentid, payments_enrolcharges.amount, students.firstName AS studentFirst, students.lastName AS studentLast, charges_enrolments.classDate, charges_enrolments.enrolGrandTotal, days.name AS dayName, classes.startTimeDisplay, classLevels.name AS levelName, staff.firstName AS instructorFirst, staff.lastName AS instructorLast, charges_enrolments.ennetrate
FROM payments_enrolcharges
INNER JOIN students ON (students.id = payments_enrolcharges.studentid) INNER JOIN charges_enrolments ON (charges_enrolments.id = payments_enrolcharges.enrolchargeid) INNER JOIN classes ON (classes.id = charges_enrolments.classId) INNER JOIN classLevels ON (classLevels.id = classes.classLevel) INNER JOIN staff ON (staff.id = classes.instructor) INNER JOIN days ON (days.id = classes.day)
WHERE payments_enrolcharges.paymentid = :P1 /* {{id}} */
ORDER BY payments_enrolcharges.studentid ASC, charges_enrolments.classDate ASC, charges_enrolments.enrolid ASC

SELECT SUM(tpayments.amount) AS paymentsTotal
FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT tlp.*
    FROM payments_familycharges tp
        LEFT JOIN payments_enrolcharges tlp ON tp.id = tlp.paymentid
        LEFT JOIN charges_enrolments pw ON tlp.enrolchargeid = pw.id
        WHERE pw.chargeId = :P1
    ) tpayments

SELECT s.id, s.firstName, s.lastName, COUNT(DISTINCT e.enrolid) AS enrolmentsCount, SUM(e.enrolGrandTotal) AS enrolmentsTotal
FROM students s JOIN charges_enrolments e ON s.id = e.studentid
WHERE s.family = :P1 AND e.chargeId = :P2 
GROUP BY s.id, s.firstName, s.lastName

SELECT DISTINCT SUM(charges_enrolments.enrolGrandTotal) AS classTotal, charges_enrolments.enrolid, enrolments.student, enrolments.startDate, enrolments.dropDate, classes.startTimeDisplay AS classStartTime, classes.endTimeDisplay AS classEndTime, classLevels.name AS classLevelName, days.name AS classDay, staff.firstName AS instructorFirst, staff.lastName AS instructorLast, charges_enrolments.classId
FROM charges_enrolments
LEFT JOIN enrolments ON (enrolments.id = charges_enrolments.enrolid) INNER JOIN classes ON (classes.id = charges_enrolments.classId) INNER JOIN classLevels ON (classLevels.id = classes.classLevel) INNER JOIN days ON (days.id = classes.day) INNER JOIN staff ON (staff.id = classes.instructor)
WHERE charges_enrolments.chargeId = :P1 /* {{chargeid}} */ AND charges_enrolments.studentid = :P2 /* {{id}} */
GROUP BY charges_enrolments.enrolid, enrolments.student, enrolments.startDate, enrolments.dropDate, classes.startTimeDisplay, classes.endTimeDisplay, classLevels.name, days.name, staff.firstName, staff.lastName, charges_enrolments.classId

SELECT DISTINCT *
FROM charges_enrolments
WHERE chargeId = :P1 /* {{chargeid}} */ AND enrolid = :P2 /* {{enrolid}} */
